jtvModal.title: Your One-time deposit with a special interest rate has been enabled

content.title: How does a term deposit work?

bullets.text: After the term has expired, the funds will be automatically deposited into your account
The interest rate on the day of arrangement is guaranteed for the entire duration of the Term Deposit

form.title: Term Deposit from
form.currencyChangeTitle: The change of the account resulted in a change of currency to {currency}

bullets.text: Appreciation of money with an attractive interest rate with no maximum deposit limit
The entire amount accrues interest for the duration of the deposit
Arrange quickly with no management fees
Automatically renewable
Term Deposits available in EUR and USD with Foreign Currency Account
Deposit a minimum of EUR 1,500 to get an interest rate of 2.7 % p.a. on your EUR term deposits
The interest rate applies to the entire deposit for its full duration
The full amount will be paid out automatically after the term deposit expires
Arranged within minutes with no maintenance fees
The length of the deposit will automatically renew until you cancel the deposit
On the renewal date of the deposit, you can withdraw the deposit free of charge or deposit additional money
The interest rate applies to the entire deposit as of the next renewal date
No maintenance fees, and opened within minutes in just a couple of clicks
After cancellation, the amount will be transferred back to the account from which it was deposited

interestRateSection.footer: Interest rate subject to change in the future

typeSection.title: Automatic renewal of the term deposit

revolving.title: Renew after the term expires (revolving deposit)
revolving.detail:
The term deposit will automatically renew until it is cancelled 

On the renewal date, you can withdraw the deposit free of charge or add additional funds

oneTime.title: One-time deposit, no renewal (single deposit)
oneTime.detail: After the term has expired, the deposit and accrued interest will be deposited to your account

contract.title: Read the One-Time Term Deposit Application and additional documents
contract.titleRevolving: Read the Revolving Term Deposit Application and additional documents
contract.detail: All documents can be found in the Documents section of Smart Banka

cosign.title: The request has been signed and sent to other approvers for signature
cosign.detail:
Itâ€™s done. In order for the request to be sent, it must be signed by other approvers according to the Signature Rules. Once that is done, the deposit will be realized no later than on the following business day.

Make sure there are sufficient funds in the account {0} to make the transfer. The money will be transferred automatically.

The request, related documents and product details can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the Documents and Agreements section.

prepared.title: The request has been sent to other approvers
prepared.detail:
It's done. In order for the request to be sent, it must be signed by other approvers according to the Signature Rules. Once that is done, the deposit will be realized no later than on the following business day.

Make sure there are sufficient funds in the account {0} to make the transfer. The money will be transferred automatically.

The request, related documents and product details can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the Documents and Agreements section.

victory.title: Done! Your request is being processed
victory.detail:
The term deposit will be opened right away or on the following business day the latest.

Please make sure to have sufficient funds for the transfer in your account {0}. The money will be transferred automatically after the term deposit has been opened.

The application, all relevant documents as well as product information can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in Documents.

nib.taxResidencyDescription: This information is required by law no. 253/2008 Sb. on money laundering.

termDepositType.label: Would you like to renew your Term Deposit?

jtv.label: One-time deposit, no renewal (single deposit)
jtv.description: After the term has expired, the deposit and accrued interest will be deposited to your account.
jtv.tooltip:
After the term deposit expires, the full amount with the accrued interest will be automatically transferred to your preferred account.

The interest rate at the time of opening the term deposit will apply for the full term.

rtv.label: Renew after the term expires (revolving deposit)
rtv.description:
The length of the deposit will automatically renew until you cancel the deposit.
On the renewal date of the deposit, you can withdraw the deposit free of charge or deposit additional money.
rtv.tooltip:
The revolving deposit will be automatically renewed after the term has expired.

Interest rate is subject to change at renewal depending on the current interest rates on the day of renewal.

On the day of renewal you may withdraw the deposit free of charge or deposit additional money.
